name: KURUI 3lb Sledge Hammer & Flat Chisel with Hand Protection for Tile/Rock/Masonry/Concrete/Brick/rockhounding, Mason Flat Head Chisel & Small Drilling Hammer with Anti-Slip Handle
short_description: WIDELY USED FOR VARIOUS TASKS – This mini rock hammer and flat head masonry chisel set is very useful in the fields of geological prospecting, hand carving, breaking stones, masonry and simple garden repairing projects and can help you finish your work easily and perfectly.

SUPERIOR HIGH-CARBON STEEL – Both the crack hammer and stone chisel are made of premium high-carbon steel, which is super strong and durable, making these masonry tools strong enough to withstand years of heavy-duty work. The handles of the sledgehammer and the sharp flat head chisel are covered with high-quality TPR to prevent slipping and reduce shocking.

HEAVY DUTY MASONRY CHISEL – The sharp flat head of this chisel can help you finish your work efficiently when processing marble, stone, tiles, concretes and bricks. What’s more, the wide hand guard on the handle of the tile chisel is specially designed to protect your hand from getting hurt during working.

STRONG & STURDY SLEDGEHAMMER – The sledge hammer consists of a 3lb hammer head and a 14-inch-long anti-slip handle, which ensures the perfect balance and higher efficiency when working. The handle contains a bar made of glass fiber that helps reduce shocking and vibrating when hitting, thus reducing fatigue.

WHAT YOU GET - You will receive one high-strength sledgehammer and one sharp and heavy-duty masonry chisel, both made of premium high-carbon steel that’s strong and durable for years of use. name: FUNSUEI 2 PCS 30 oz Masonry Brick Hammer, All Steel Forged Brick Hammer with Non-Slip Shock Absorbing Grip
short_description: SOLID BUILD - This flat-head rock pick hammer is forged from premium carbon steel, strong and durable, not easy to crack. The chrome-plated head is fully polished to ensure maximum strength and hardness, and it is ideal for heavy exploration work in the field.

ERGONOMIC HANDLE - Our forged brick hammer has a TPR rubber handle that is shockproof and anti-slip, and has a finger-fitting curve for a comfortable grip and easy operation. It has a perfect balance and force-to-weight ratio for better swing speed and hitting force with less wrist fatigue.

DOUBLE-HEAD DESIGN - You will get 2 masonry brick hammers, featuring a double-headed design with a square surface at one end and a flat head at the other. The square striking surface can be worked as a flattening metal, and the sharp flat head makes it easier to crack rocks and stones.

AVAILABLE WIDELY - The geologist rock hammer is great for rock searching, gold mining, masonry building, geological exploration, and other outdoor activities. It can handily crack or chisel bricks, concrete, stones, and rocks, perfect for prospectors, geologists, archaeologists, campers, etc.
